[vc_row type=”full-width-section” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”bottom” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”tt_parallax” parallax_image=”7625″ overlay=”1″ overlay_color=”rgba(10,10,10,0.3)” el_class=”Header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603711987376{border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”MINING” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:58|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605611023037{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1603786216707{margin-bottom: -120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Dig It Out!” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605060290538{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Mining is the extraction of valuable minerals or other geological materials from the Earth, usually from an ore body, lode, vein, seam, reef or placer deposit. These deposits form a mineralized package that is of economic interest to the miner.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605060549523{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We fulfil our purpose by delivering on our strategy to be active at every stage of the commodity supply chain. Our prospects lies in diversity of geography, production, create authentic product, and build value for the business and its diverse stakeholders.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605061016866{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1603788808831{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7468″ img_size=”600*375″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” animation=”rda_fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1605060916263{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”INTEGRATED MININGS SOLUTIONS” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”The rise in infrastructure development and automotive production has been driving growth in mining sector over the last decade. Apart from the Minerals & Metal industries, Power & Cement industries are also aiding growth in the mining sector. We have been simultaneously expanding our reach.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”PROJECTS” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28|text_align:center|color:%23800080″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”]

We have branched out our mining division with projects in the African countries like Zambia, Kenya and Ghana, taken care by wholly owned subsidiaries AVS Kenya & AVS Ghana.

We have built close ties by supplying quality heavy duty vehicles and equipment to its government and eventually establishing a business vertical solely dedicated for mining in Zambia.

We also provide consultancy services to various government(s) and companies in this specialized segment.

We engage in sales of specialised vehicles such as fire trucks, dozers, motor graders, excavators, loaders, compactors and other heavy duty equipment.

We believe in prioritising safety at all our assets; as we seek to minimise our impacts on the environment and communities; and aim to be leaders of today and tomorrow.

[vc_single_image image=”7479″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”mulled_wine” css=”.vc_custom_1603795378649{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our operations comprise around the mining and metallurgical sites in the African continent. Our purpose is to allocate the sources responsibly as we head to the future.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We fulfil our purpose by delivering on our strategy to be active at every stage of the commodity supply chain.
